nodes.text: The Patriot Fist  was a Recusant-class light destroyer that served in the naval forces of the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars against the Galactic Republic. During the war in 19 BBY, the destroyer fought alongside Lucrehulk-class Battleships and Munificent-class star frigates in the Battle of Coruscant against the Republic Navy's fleet of Venator-class Star Destroyers. In the battle, several Vulture-class droid starfighters flew past the Patriot Fist.
